content.title: Post Office Monthly Income Scheme
content.beneficiary: Individuals looking for a steady income
content.details: Post Office Monthly Income Scheme (POMIS) is an investment scheme recognized and validated by the Ministry of Finance. It is one of the highest-earning schemes with an interest rate of 6.6%. The interest in this scheme is disbursed monthly. After opening a POMIS account, individuals can invest a suitable amount based on affordability, which, however, should not be less than ₹1500. It provides low risk and steady income where an investor can deposit every month and get interested of MIS in the post office according to their applicable monthly rate.
eligibility: The applicant must be a citizen of India.
The applicant must be residing in India.
The applicant should be at least 18 years old.
exclusions: This system does not apply to non-resident Indians.
documents_required: Proof of Identity: Copy of government issued ID such as Passport / Voter ID card / Driving License/Aadhaar, etc.
Proof of Address: Government-issued ID or recent utility bills.

faqs.question: How Can I Withdraw Money From My POMIS Account After The Tenure?
faqs.answer: You can withdraw the deposited amount from the account either from the post office or you can also get it credited in your savings account through ECS.

faqs.question: Can I Transfer POMIS Account?
faqs.answer: Yes, your account can be transferred from one post office to another for absolutely free.

faqs.question: Can I Reinvest My Accumulated Amount In POMIS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it allows the investors to reinvest their accumulated money at the end of the tenure.

faqs.question: Is There Any Tax Deduction At Source?
faqs.answer: No, there is no TDS (Tax Deduction at Source). But, the interests earned are taxable.

faqs.question: Is There Any Nomination Facility Available In POMIS?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme allows you to select and appoint a nominee against the account.

faqs.question: Can A Senior Citizen Also Invest In POMIS?
faqs.answer: Yes, POMIS is most suitable for senior citizens and retired persons.
